refnamediv.refpurpose: General function for modifying mesh_im objects

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: gf_mesh_im_set(MIM, 'integ', { integ im | int IMDEGREE }, [, ivec CVIDX])

listitem.para: gf_mesh_im_set(MIM, 'integ', im [, CVIDX]) : set im as the integration method for all the convexes listed in CVIDX in the mesh linked to MF. If CVIDX is not used, the im is assigned to all convexes.

gf_mesh_im_set(MIM, 'integ', IM_DEGREE [, CVIDX]) : assign a classical approximate integration method of order at least IM_DEGREE on the listed convexes. If IM_DEGREE=-1, then the dummy integration method 'IM_NONE' is used.
